2:
What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'Nous invitons Pierre?'
a. Nous l'invitons.
b. Nous lui invitons.
c. Nous invitons lui.
d.Nous leur invitons

What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'Tu ecris a Charlotte.'
a. Tu lui ecris. 
b. Tu la ecris. 
c. Tu ecris  a elle. 
d. Tu l'ecris.

What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'J'aide mes parents.'
a. Je les aide. 
b. Je leur aide. 
c. Je l'aide. 
d. Je la aide.

What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'Nous parlons à nos amis.'
a. Nous leur parlons.
b. Nous lui parlons. 
c. Nous la parlons. 
d. Nous le parlons.

What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'Vous lavez la voiture.'
a. Vous la lavez. 
b. Vous le lavez. 
c. Vous lui lavez. 
d. Vous les lavez.

Translate into French. 'Amy talks to me.'
a. Amy me parle.
b. Amy parle moi. 
c. Amy te parle. 
d. Amy mon parle.

What would the new sentence be with an object pronoun for 'Vous allez à la piscine.'
a. la
b. lui
c. y
d. en

Translate into English: J'y vais demain.
a. I am going tomorrow.
b. I am going there tomorrow.
c. I have to go there tomorrow.
d. I am going there with him tomorrow.
3:
Which one of these constructions expresses the immediate past?
a. je vais parler
b. je veux parler
c. je viens de parler
d. J'ai parle

Which one of these constructions correctly reflects le passe compose?
a. Il a fini
b. Il est fini
c. il va finir
d. Il vient de finir

Which one of these conjugations is NOT a valid form of the verb 'mettre'?
a. je mets
b. vous mettez
c. tu mets
d. Ils mettrent

Which one of these is the correct past participle for the verb 'prendre'?
a. prenu
b. pris
c. prendu
d. Prende

Which one of these is a demonstrative adjective?
a. cette
b. une
c. la
d. sa

Which one of these comparisons is NOT valid?
a. moins cher que
b. Aussi beau que
c. plus bon que
d. Moins laid que

When forming a command in French (the imperative), you may refer to all of these subject prounouns except?
a. tu
b. ils
c. nous
d. vous

All of the following verbs require 'etre' in the passe compose except:
a. partir
b. sortir
c. venir
d. devoir

a. nothing
b. add -e
c. add -es
d. add -s

What would you place in front of this country? ______Portugal
a. au
b. en
c. aux
d. a
